issue.title: [CF 223] "Slow" debuff group of spells
issue.body:
Is it possible to add "slow" group of spells in debuffs category? So that the icon is shown when i.e. target is slowed by one of the following spells:

http://eu.battle.net/wow/en/forum/topic/1999565572

Paladin
Dazed - Avenger's Shield

Warlock
Curse of Exhaustion

Priest
Mind Flay

Rogue
Crippling Poison
Deadly Throw
Waylay

Feral
Infected Wounds
Dazed

Boomkin
Typhoon

Hunter
Ice Trap
Concussive Shot

Death Knight
Chilblains
Chains of Ice
Desecration

Warrior
Hamstring
Piercing Howl

Mage
Frostfire Bolt
Frostbolt
Frost Armor
Cone of Cold
Slow

Shaman
Frostbrand Weapon
Frost Shock
Earthbind Totem


> Posted by CurseForge user algus2 | Imported from CurseForge issue #223 | Raw
